review: Very disappointed.  Didn't know much about the fire stick just what I saw advertised and that looked promising.  But found out half the stuff I was interested in was a separate purchase and the hbo go had to be on a tablet.  Very few movies to chose from.  If I had known  this about it I would not have purchased the stick.  Seriously thinking about returning.

review: So far we have really really enjoyed the fire stick. Its great and easy to use. It just makes me uncomfortable how there is no off button. I don't like things that don't turn off just "sleep". And it would to so useful if when you typed into the search on the home menu that it pulls up the results from all the sources you have like Netflix and Hulu and amazon. That way you don't have to go through each individual one. But over all really cool and easy to use.
